text: I'm trying to establish a new routine, starting with morning jogs at the park. It's been refreshing and gives me a sense of normalcy.
I had my first therapy session today. It was tough, but I feel like it's a step in the right direction.
I attended a meeting at Haven of Hope today. It's comforting to be around others who understand what I'm going through.
Just wanted to say thank you for being there for me. It means a lot.
